description.text: JoeRunner meets his friend T.T. outside the school.
description.html: JoeRunner meets his friend T.T. outside the school.

lines.d: The boy with black hair watches as JoeRunner walks out of a minivan with a canoe strapped to the top. The boy wears a T-shirt reading “77” and shorts, has constant dropped eyebrows, and speaks in an all-lowercase sans-serif font.
JoeRunner walks up to the boy.
Hey, JoeRunner, you made it! And it only took, like, two decades!
Yeah, there was lots of traffic on North 1 today.
The boy starts walking to the door.
T.T. / one heck of a guy

Yeah, yeah, excuses, excuses.

Come on! We’re only gonna have time for six games of Hyper Galactic Battle Ducks III! Six!

content.html:
Irrelevant information

I’m posting this technically before I’m ready. I’ll be reorganizing some parts of the site shortly, but I’ve been waiting too long to post this as it is.
